rows.label: qev065301_MSG0001
rows.name: Hmm? Hmmmmm? Are you [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Oh, you are CUTE! Just like Eri said.
Or definitely within acceptable tolerances, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0010
rows.name: Thank

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod and give an awkward half-smile.

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lyvia who this "Eri" person is.

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0003
rows.name: Hee! Then let's shake hands! Come on, shake![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0004
rows.name: ...Eri? Geez, what's got you all in a huff?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0005
rows.name:
It would take far worse than that to get a rise out of
me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0006
rows.name:
However, I owe [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] a great deal. I would appreciate it
if you showed a bit more respect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0007
rows.name: Oh, Eri's...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ah, speak of the devil! There she is in the flesh.
...Well? Ring any bells?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Lyvia, [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] is a normal human.
Of course [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] won't recognize me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey there, [ST:playername ]. It's been a while.
...Er, it's me. Erio? The Definian?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0011
rows.name:
This is the shape I've taken for now. How do I look?
Not strange, I hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0030
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Erio that she looks fantastic.

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0040
rows.name: Criticize

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Erio that her new look isn't really your style.

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0012
rows.name: You are kind as always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Aw, look at you blush, Eri! You didn't tell me you
had this big of a crush on [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0014
rows.name:
Honest as ever, I see. But hmm...
This one was no good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Aw, don't be so sad, Eri. Still, you didn't tell me [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ]
was such a heartbreaker! Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0016
rows.name:
Heck, I'm only teasing, Eri! Though I will say that after
talking for just a minute or two, I can see why you'd
be so intrigued.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0017
rows.name:
These humans really are interesting.
Maybe I should find me one to date, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0018
rows.name:
[ST:playername ] is a friend and someone
to whom I owe a great deal.
Stop suggesting anything else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0019
rows.name:
And while repeating myself any further is probably
useless, I've already explained that we are Definians.
Our kind do not experience romantic love.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0020
rows.name: Oh, pshaw! You don't know until you try![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0021
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ], I have a job for you.
Very urgent. Could you round up some boyfriend
candidates you think might be a good fit for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Pleeease? I'm sure a human acting as go-between will
be a lot less startling than me going around asking
directly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Yaaay! If I'm being honest, I've already scouted out a
few eligible bachelors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0024
rows.name:
There's Maxim, Kent D. Carr, and Giotto. I'd love it if
you could go interview them, then bring back whoever
you think is the best fit for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0025
rows.name: You do that, and I'll prove Definians can love just fine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0026
rows.name:
Do this for me and I promise I'll never ask another
favor. I just want to get swept off my feet once,
you know? So thanks for finding me a prince![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0027
rows.name:
Yaaay! Oh, and if I'm being totally honest,
I've already scouted out a few prime candidates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0028
rows.name:
There's Maxim, Kent D. Carr, and Giotto. I'd love it if
you could go interview them, then bring back whoever
you think is the best fit for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0029
rows.name: You do that, and I'll prove Definians can love just fine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0030
rows.name:
The names of the boys I've scouted out are Maxim,
Kent D. Carr, and Giotto. Pick the best of those three,
then bring him by to meet me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0031
rows.name:
Ooo, you brought Maxim? He's so interesting to talk
to, isn't he? He could make a fine boyfriend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ooo, you brought Kent? He's so brilliant, right?
He could make a fine boyfriend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0033
rows.name:
Ooo, you brought Giotto? He's so vibrant and full of
energy. He could make a fine boyfriend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0034
rows.name: Now it's just a matter of figuring out my approach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0035
rows.name: So what's your style when talking up a cutie?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0090
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0091
rows.name: Say that Lyvia should give him a present.

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0100
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0101
rows.name: Admit that you've never really dated before.

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0036
rows.name:
Aw, you're the giving type, huh?
Generous is always an attractive look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0037
rows.name:
Hmm, then maybe I'll give him a snowy angelhair,
some muranadium, and a primitive colossus statue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0038
rows.name:
Whaaat? With Eri so head-over-heels for you,
I just assumed you had folks beating down your
door with sticks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0039
rows.name: Huh. I suppose you never can tell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0040
rows.name:
Well then, maybe I'll give him something.
Everybody like presents, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0041
rows.name:
As for what to give, maybe a snowy angelhair,
some muranadium, aaaaand...a primitive colossus![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0042
rows.name:
I'll be waiting right here when you get back with all
that. Thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0043
rows.name:
If you could scrounge up those presents ASAP,
that'd be awesome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0044
rows.name:
In return, I promise to snare his heart.
It's one hundred percent guaranteed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0083
rows.name:
Oh, welcome back! I was killing time waiting for you
to get back by talking to Maxim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0084
rows.name:
It's just one fascinating topic after the next with him.
And he speaks so pretty![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0085
rows.name:
You've got fantastic taste, you know that?
Thanks for introducing me to such a keeper![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0086
rows.name:
Ah, such flattery! And to think it spills from the lips
of one so beautiful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0087
rows.name:
Oh, welcome back! I was killing time waiting for you
to get back by talking to Kent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0088
rows.name:
He's been explaining one new thing after the next to
me, and in such simple terms. I feel smarter already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0089
rows.name:
You've got fantastic taste, you know that?
Thanks for introducing me to such a keeper![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0090
rows.name:
You're the first girl that's ever put up with my mundane
prattle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0092
rows.name:
Oh, welcome back! I was killing time waiting for you
to get back by talking to Giotto.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0093
rows.name:
It's been one wild BLADE adventure story after the next.
He's kept me on the edge of my seat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0094
rows.name:
You've got fantastic taste, you know that?
Thanks for introducing me to such a keeper![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0095
rows.name:
Gosh. I think this is the first time I've ever gotten to
chat with a nice girl like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0097
rows.name: Tee hee! Soooo...any luck with those presents?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0098
rows.name:
Whoooa, you really went and got them all!
Man, that must have been a seriously huge pain.
I know it's way too late to say this, but um...sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0099
rows.name:
You just have this vibe like you could make any request
happen. Guess I kinda got swept up in that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0130
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0131
rows.name: Say that you're nothing quite so magical.

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0140
rows.name: Blush

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0141
rows.name: Turn red as you soak up the compliment.

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0100
rows.name:
And then to play it off like it's no big thing!
Oof, yeah, you're something really special.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0101
rows.name:
Hee hee! Awww, look at how adorable you are!
I'm sure letting that cute side peek out in between all
the butt-kicking is a big part of your charm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0102
rows.name: But thanks. I'll take these...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0103
rows.name:
And give them to you, [ST:playername ]!
Yeppers, I've thought on it long and hard,
and decided you're the one I'm really stuck on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0104
rows.name: No! Can this be so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0105
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, Maxim. It finally clicked for me halfway
through our chat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0106
rows.name:
You're wonderful, but it's [ST:playername ]
that I have special feelings for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0107
rows.name:
Besides, I'm sure if you saw the real me you'd run
away screaming. And no one wants that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0108
rows.name:
No! That's untrue! I would worship at your feet no
matter what you looked like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0109
rows.name: You really sure about that? Well, okaaay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0110
rows.name: Surprise?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0111
rows.name: EEEAAAAAAAAUUUGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0112
rows.name: Told you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0113
rows.name: Um, wait. Really? But what about—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0114
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, Kent! It finally clicked for me halfway
through our chat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0115
rows.name:
You're wonderful, but it's [ST:playername ]
I have special feelings for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0116
rows.name:
Besides, I'm sure if you saw the real me you'd run
away screaming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0117
rows.name:
There is no metamorphosis you could undergo that
would startle me, Lyvia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0118
rows.name: You sure about that? Okaaay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0119
rows.name: How about this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0120
rows.name: I see. ...Fascinating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0121
rows.name:
But if I am not what you need, there is little purpose
for me to linger. Be well, Lyvia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0122
rows.name:
Wow, he actually wasn't startled at all.
That's pretty impressive, honestly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0123
rows.name: Wha—hey![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0124
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, Giotto! It finally clicked for me halfway
through our chat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0125
rows.name:
You're wonderful, but it's [ST:playername ]
that I have special feelings for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0126
rows.name:
Besides, I'm sure if you saw the real me you'd run
away screaming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0127
rows.name:
Aw, heck no! Whatever it is you're worried about,
you're still you, Lyvia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0128
rows.name: You sure about that? Okaaay...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0129
rows.name: Scared yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0130
rows.name:
Hell, that ain't so bad. Me and my pecs have faced a
lot scarier xenos out there in the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0131
rows.name:
Still, being dumped is new. And I won't lie—it stings.
I just never met a girl like you before, and I got all
excited...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0132
rows.name:
But if that's your decision, it's cool. I'll go pump some
iron and sweat out all my disappointment.
Thanks for the memories, Lyv.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0133
rows.name: Aw, I'm sorry, Giotto. Gosh, I feel awful now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0134
rows.name:
...So? What do you say, [ST:playername ]?
You probably don't find me very attractive, do you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0150
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0151
rows.name: Tell Lyvia that's not the case at all.

rows.label: qev065301_JNK0160
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev065301_SEL0161
rows.name: Gently break it to Lyvia that she's not your type.

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0135
rows.name: Really?! Ooh, then we can—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0136
rows.name:
Aw, nooo! Well, I'm not giving up that easy.
I'll make you fall for me, just you—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0137
rows.name:
Oh, that's ENOUGH, Lyvia! Stop bothering
[ST:playername ] with this nonsense![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0138
rows.name: Whaaaat? Nonsense? I'm just saying that I like [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0139
rows.name:
That's precisely what I mean! Just hearing you say
that makes me...nauseous for some reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0140
rows.name:
I don't know why, but you have to stop. Please.
You're going to drive me insane.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0141
rows.name: Mm-hmmmmm. I see how it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0142
rows.name:
You're lucky I like you so much, Eri. But all right.
I'll call a truce...for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0143
rows.name:
You're so naughty, [ST:playername ]...
Not one but TWO Definians going crazy for you?
Grrrawl![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065301_MSG0144
rows.name:
Well, here's a little something to remember me by.
No no! It's a present! No need to give anything back.
...For now, anyway.[ST:wait ]
